0: The Ritz Carlton experience is always phenomenal
The event held at the Ritz was extremely well put together and had a great atmosphere to it
In our experience Ritz Carlton hotels as elegant as they are do not really have over the top bathrooms and frankly that is okay
Just finished a convention there and had the most creative Chef in town deliver over the top experiences to our group
I have an awesome experience here every time
The room decor ambiance and customer service make you feel special
Staff from valet to cleaning provided a great experience
Luxury brand Hotel by far the best experience I ve ever had there
Staying at the Ritz Carlton is always an fantastic experience
1: The Worst Ritz Experience to Date
In surroundings like this you are tempted never to leave the room
Unfortunately besides having good experience with the hotel facility we were having a horrible experience with the reception
Not what I expected or have experienced before at the Ritz
Actually it was an improvement over the original dining room because the smell from the cigar club next to the original dining room made for a very unpleasant experience
